desc: Oddball Coffee Roasters is a small batch coffee roaster located in Morgantown, WV. We believe in keeping things weird or dare you say "Odd" when it comes to drinking coffee. We specialize in single origin coffee featuring wild notes like Strawberry Jam, Oatmeal Raisin Cookie, and more. Grab a bag of today!

layout.text: Imagine sitting down with a cup of coffee that tastes like a cup full of strawberry jam instead of burnt beans.
